effects.display_string: (2) Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 493,380 damage to your primary target and 113,788 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,401 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 138,912 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
